name: Hart Missionary Baptist Church
description: Baptist church providing food ministry and outreach services to Laurel County residents. Offers food distribution program called 'Feed the Need' to help families in need.
source: Verified from Google search results, church website, and multiple food bank directories
eligibility_requirements: Laurel County residents, must bring current form of identification
notes: Rated 5.0 out of 5 stars with 13 Google reviews. One box of food per household. Must be present to receive a box. Part of God's Pantry Food Bank network. Also partners with Operation BBQ Relief for community meals.
